org.ldaptive.provider

Interface ProviderConnection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApacheLdapConnection, JLdapConnection, JLdapSSLConnection, JLdapStartTLSConnection, JndiConnection, JndiStartTLSConnection, OpenDJConnection, UnboundIDConnection

    public interface ProviderConnection
    Interface for a provider specific implementation of ldap operations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Bind to the ldap.

      Tear down this connection to an LDAP.
